name: Obsidian Sword
description: A blade forged from sharp obsidian rock, known for its cutting power and supernatural properties.
looks: The obsidian sword has a sleek, black blade with a jagged edge. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and the pommel is adorned with a small obsidian gem.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

special_effects.bleed_effect: Chance to cause a bleeding effect on the target.

name: Steel Battleaxe
description: A heavy and powerful battleaxe made of steel
looks: The steel battleaxe has a long handle made of oak and a large, double-bladed head made of sturdy steel. The blades are sharp and polished, with intricate engravings along the edges.

special_weapon_skills.axe: Grants a bonus to Axe skill when wielded.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A worn and rusty sword that has seen better days.
looks: The sword has a worn wooden hilt and a rusty blade. Despite its poor condition, it still has a sharp edge.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a simple design with a straight blade and a hilt wrapped in leather.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made from steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather, providing a comfortable grip. It is well-balanced and suitable for both slashing and thrusting attacks.

special_weapon_skills.sword_combat: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.
special_weapon_skills.parry: Allows the user to parry incoming attacks with a sword.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick, polished steel plates, covering the entire hand and extending up to the forearm. They have adjustable leather straps for a secure fit and reinforced knuckles for added protection.

name: Steel Greaves
description: Heavy steel greaves that provide excellent leg protection.
looks: The steel greaves are made of thick steel plates that cover the lower legs. They have adjustable leather straps for a secure fit.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword engulfed in flames, capable of dealing fire damage to enemies.
looks: The flaming sword has a long and sharp blade made of steel, with flames constantly licking up along the edges. The hilt is adorned with intricate designs and the grip is wrapped in red leather.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Grants a bonus to Fire Magic skill while wielding.

special_effects.burning_damage: Chance to inflict burn damage on enemies

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver, known for its ability to deal extra damage to supernatural creatures.
looks: The silver sword is a gleaming blade with an ornate hilt adorned with intricate engravings of wolves and moon phases. The blade itself shines with a silvery glow, reflecting the light in a mesmerizing way.

special_weapon_skills.silver_smite: Grants a bonus to damage dealt against supernatural creatures.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy steel gauntlets that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates, covering the entire hand and extending up to the forearm. They have reinforced knuckles and finger guards.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made from iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a simple hilt and a wooden grip. It is well-balanced and sturdy.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: @provide item name here
looks: @provide description of how the item looks
item_usage: @provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk

usage_requirements: @one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of steel that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates, covering the entire hand and extending up to the forearm. They have a textured surface and reinforced knuckles for added durability.
